sentences.sContent: I just shrugged my shoulders and ignored him.
sentences.sCn: 我只是耸耸肩，没有理睬他。

sentences.sContent: ...it was that governments cannot shrug their shoulders and watch as their own people are being laid off...

phrases.pCn: 摆脱；抖去；不屑理睬；耸肩表示蔑视；扭身脱掉衣服

trans.tranOther: to raise and then lower your shoulders in order to show that you do not know something or do not care about something
